name: Ironhide Game Studio
detail: Ironhide Game Studio is a video game studio based in Montevideo, Uruguay. It was founded on January 26, 2010 by Alvaro Azofra, Gonzalo Sande, and Pablo Realini, creators of the Kingdom Rush saga.

works.name: Kingdom Rush Vengeance / 王国保卫战：复仇
Kingdom Rush Origins / 王国保卫战：起源
